Sec4.title: Our history
Sec4.text: Here we show you our history, in which you can see our trajectory through the years, making SOLARIX the company it is today.

items.text1: Solarix Energy is a subsidiary of LCP Grupo Peralta, S.A. de C.V., which for over 20 years has been providing solutions in electrical equipment, renewable technologies, and communication systems to Mexico's industry in medium and high voltage. Grupo Peralta was born as an alternative to meet the needs of the Federal Electricity Commission. Grupo Peralta developed residential solar energy projects and the first solar farm in Mexico, which to this day supplies clean energy to the community of Guaycora, Sonora with an isolated system of solar panels and batteries.
items.text2: Solarix Energy was born in 2015 with the goal and focus solely on offering innovative solutions in renewable energy generating systems for residences, businesses, and industry. At the beginning of 2021, Solarix Energy signed an alliance with SunPower with the goal of creating a differentiation strategy based on quality, reliability, and shopping experience. Solarix formalized itself as one of the first companies in Sonora focused 100% on offering solar energy solutions for its different clients, always offering the best available technologies.
items.text3: Solarix seeks to satisfy and exceed the expectations of its clients. By mid-2023, Solarix Energy has installed just over 400 photovoltaic systems for residential, commercial, industrial clients, and isolated systems with lithium-based energy storage systems. Our current focus is to offer premium solar systems hand in hand with SunPower, based on technology, rapid response, and aesthetics in our installations, always with the goal of meeting the needs of our clients and the security of installations guaranteeing our systems with up to 40 years warranty. Currently, we have solar installations in 8 states and have the capacity to install in any state of the Mexican republic.

Sec3.title: Our Best-Seller
Sec3.text: Due to their bifacial technology, performance cells generate the most energy throughout the year, which is why they are the most recommended by us to our clients, as this additional energy can cover the increase in electrical consumption.

Sec4.title: A better future for everyone
Sec4.text: SunPower Maxeon panels will generate more energy than standard solar panels from day one. Each panel is designed to maximize the conversion of sunlight into electricity for your home.

items.text1: SunPower Performance cells use hypercells and back-contact conductivity, eliminating unsightly metallic grid lines and allowing them to absorb more sunlight.
items.text2: With high efficiency, LID-resistant solar cells (G12, 210 mm), a lower temperature coefficient, and front conductive wires with higher current capture, the unique design of SunPower Performance panels allows them to deliver more lifetime energy than standard solar panels.
items.text3: A patented shingle-type cell design that maximizes durability in all weather conditions and includes reinforced cell connections to withstand the stresses of daily temperature changes, redundant electrical circuits that alleviate the impact of cracked cells, and an advanced electrical architecture more resistant to the effects of shading and capable of mitigating the formation of hot spots.

Sec5.title: Turning the conventional into extraordinary
Sec5.text: Shingle-type cell panel technology uniquely designed to obtain more energy, more reliability, and greater durability than traditional front-contact panels.

items.text1: Performance panels are designed to avoid depending on diodes as the main mechanism to avoid hot spots. A smaller cell surface automatically reduces current while still maintaining direct physical contact with neighboring cells through a series of redundant connections that dissipate heat buildup in the cells.
